column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The Good: Where to begin? The food is absolutely spectacular. The bacon-wrapped dates are a must
column2: and the goat cheese in tomato sauce is equally amazing. I don't think I've had a bad thing on the menu
column3: but I have yet to try many of the dishes. Also
column4: the sangria is superb - I particularly love the classic red and the white peach. My one friend is convinced that Babareeba should sell the peach sangria in an "adult juicebox" because she loved it so much. It's also a very beautiful restaurant
column5: with lots to offer everyone. The waitstaff is really attentive considering how busy it gets too!
